CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF(NOT(Move_country_to_green__c), CASE(Account.BillingCountry, "China", "/img/samples/light_red.gif", "Cuba", "/img/samples/light_red.gif", "Iran", "/img/samples/light_red.gif", "Korea, North", "/img/samples/light_red.gif", "Russia", "/img/samples/light_red.gif", "South Sudan", "/img/samples/light_red.gif", "Syria", "/img/samples/light_red.gif", "Venezuela", "/img/samples/light_red.gif", "Australia", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Austria", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Belgium", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Canada", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Croatia", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Czech Republic", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Denmark", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Finland", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "France", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Germany", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Greece", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Hungary", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Iceland", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Ireland", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Italy", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Japan", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Mexico", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Netherlands", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "New Zealand", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Norway", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Poland", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Portugal", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Singapore", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Spain", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Sweden", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Switzerland", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Turkey", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "UK", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "USA", "/img/samples/light_green.gif", "/img/samples/light_yellow.gif"), "/img/samples/light_green.gif"), "status color")
CustomField.label: Country color
